title: Slow cooker steak, kidney and mushroom filling for pies
ingredients: ['1kg diced steak', '3 lamb kidneys, trimmed and diced', '5 rashers bacon, diced', '250ml beef stock', '1 beef stock cube', '1 large onion, diced', '200g mushrooms, sliced', '2 tablespoons tomato puree', '250ml port or red wine', '2 bay leaves', '2 teaspoons minced garlic', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '1 tablespoon cornflour and water, made into a paste, for thickening', '6 sheets frozen puff pastry, thawed']
